Tool.name: generate_unreasonable_thought
Tool.Description: Generate a new unreasonable thought that challenges conventional thinking

Property.name: problem
Property.description: The problem or challenge to think unreasonably about

Property.name: previousThoughtId
Property.description: Optional ID of a previous thought to build upon or rebel against

Property.name: forceRebellion
Property.description: Force the thought to rebel against conventional wisdom

Tool.name: branch_thought
Tool.Description: Create a new branch of thinking from an existing thought

Property.name: thoughtId
Property.description: ID of the thought to branch from

Tool.name: list_thoughts
Tool.Description: List all thoughts in the current thinking session

Property.name: branchId
Property.description: Optional branch ID to filter thoughts
